title: Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Elevator Indicator", 1929–31
medium: Graphite, red colored pencil, and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Small stamp in red ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: F.S.DET. OF BZE. ELEV. INDICATOR./ONE REQ'D; at lower right: DRWG. # 2141/Teh.[?] 30; inscribed in graphite with materials throughout
description: Plan for elevator indicator for Rockefeller apartment. Half-circle arrangement with chromium plated numbers 1-8 spaced throughout arc of circle in plate glass. Hand indicator in chromium on left side, gold on right side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Elevator Indicator", 1929–31.
1929–31. Graphite, red colored pencil, and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-464.
